Blog About

A wooden christmas gift

I wanted to make a special baren as a christmas gift. A baren is a tool for applying even pressure while making prints. This baren will be used to press linoleum stamps onto paper. I made it using hand tools out a scrap of cherry.

A blog post about a story about a walk through a meadow

This past semester, I wrote a story about a walk through a changing world. It’s called A Walk.

New Balance Workshop

A few years ago I got to do a workshop with some designers from New Balance. It was very cool to learn how they approach the design of footwear. I used Houdini and took a procedural approach to the designs.

We had some strange old lenses in our attic and I was excited to try them out on the AE-1.
